revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Split-Decision Ruins |image = [[File:Split-Decision Ruins.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Split-Decision Ruins. |tokens = 2,000,000 |location = South of Frigid Sea }} '''Split-Decision Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 32,..."
